Release Notes:

You are installing [CEAL]CON 0.3! Visit http://www.cealweb.net for the latest information and news regarding [CEAL]CON.

Installation + Usage:

You must have Java JRE6 or later (1.6.20 recommended). To download the latest version of Java, visit http://www.java.com

If you need support, please register on the http://www.cealweb.net website and post your issues in the forum below:
http://www.cealweb.net/drs_plugins/forum/forum_viewforum.php?23
